title: Button Shrink Animation
description: In this lab, we will explore how to create a button shrink animation using CSS. The purpose of this lab is to help you understand how to use the `:hover` pseudo-class and `transition` property to create a smooth and visually appealing animation when a user hovers over a button. By the end of this lab, you will have a good understanding of how to create simple yet effective animations using CSS.
